trans-unit.source: Represents an object that is used to interact with an operation that has been posted to the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> queue.
trans-unit.target: Representa um objeto que é utilizado para interagir com uma operação que foram publicada no <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"> </xref> fila.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> returns a DispatcherOperation object when it is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>Devolve um objeto de DispatcherOperation quando é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: The DispatcherOperation object can be used to interact with the delegate on the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> queue, such as changing the priority of the operation or aborting the operation.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de DispatcherOperation pode ser utilizado para interagir com o delegado no <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>fila, tais como alterar a prioridade da operação ou a abortar a operação.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: To obtain the return value of the invoked delegate, use the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation.Result%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o valor devolvido do delegado invocado, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation.Result%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: The DispatcherOperation is not an exception handling boundary.
trans-unit.target: O DispatcherOperation não é um limite de processamento de exceções.

trans-unit.source: This means that exceptions are handled by the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> and are not preserved by the operation.
trans-unit.target: Isto significa que as exceções são processadas pelo <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>e não são mantidas pela operação.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: Aborts the operation.
trans-unit.target: Interrompe a operação.

trans-unit.source: If an operation is already in progress, this method will return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se uma operação já está em curso, este método irá devolver `false`.

trans-unit.source: When an operation is aborted, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation.Status%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus> and the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation.Aborted> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma operação foi abortada, a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation.Status%2A>do <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation>está definido como <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus>e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation.Aborted>o evento é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation.Aborted> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation.Status%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the operation was aborted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a operação foi abortada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the operation is aborted.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a operação foi abortada.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a operação foi concluída.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> that the operation was posted to.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"> </xref> que a operação foi publicada.

trans-unit.source: The dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: O dispatcher.

trans-unit.source: Returns an object that is notified when the asynchronous operation is finished.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um objeto que é notificado quando estiver concluída a operação assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: An object that is notified when the asynchronous operation is finished.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que é notificado quando estiver concluída a operação assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: Begins the operation that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Começa a operação que está associada a este <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the priority of the operation in the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> queue.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a prioridade da operação no <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"> </xref> fila.

trans-unit.source: The priority of the delegate on the queue.
trans-unit.target: A prioridade do delegado na fila.

trans-unit.source: Gets the result of the operation after it has completed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o resultado da operação, depois de ter concluído.

trans-unit.source: The result of the operation -or- <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the operation has not completed.
trans-unit.target: O resultado da operação - ou - <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se não tiver sido concluída a operação.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current status of the operation..
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado da operação atual...

trans-unit.source: The stages of a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> are <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus>, <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus>, and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus>.
trans-unit.target: As fases de um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation>são <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus>, <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus>e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus>.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation>

trans-unit.source: At any point before the operation has completed, the status can be set to <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus>.
trans-unit.target: Em qualquer ponto antes da operação foi concluída, o estado pode ser definido como <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus>.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus>

trans-unit.source: The status of the operation.
trans-unit.target: O estado da operação.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> that represents the current operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> que representa a operação atual.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the current operation.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que representa a operação atual.

trans-unit.source: Waits for the operation to complete
trans-unit.target: Tem de aguardar a conclusão da operação

trans-unit.source: To obtain the return value of the invoked delegate, use the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation.Result%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o valor devolvido do delegado invocado, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation.Result%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: The status of the operation.
trans-unit.target: O estado da operação.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation.Status*> is equal to <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation.Status*>é igual ao <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation.Status*>

trans-unit.source: This can occur when waiting for an operation that is already executing on the same thread.
trans-unit.target: Isto pode ocorrer quando aguarda por uma operação que já está a executar no mesmo thread.

trans-unit.source: Waits for the operation to complete in the specified period of time.
trans-unit.target: Tem de aguardar a conclusão da operação no período de tempo especificado.

trans-unit.source: To obtain the return value of the invoked delegate, use the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation.Result%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o valor devolvido do delegado invocado, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation.Result%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: The maximum period of time to wait.
trans-unit.target: O período máximo de tempo de espera.

trans-unit.source: The status of the operation.
trans-unit.target: O estado da operação.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation.Status*> is equal to <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation.Status*>é igual ao <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation.Status*>

trans-unit.source: This can occur when waiting for an operation that is already executing on the same thread.
trans-unit.target: Isto pode ocorrer quando aguarda por uma operação que já está a executar no mesmo thread.
